ePBS engine API changes pending; off-protocol payment signal moved to execution bid

organizational.highlight: Client positions on FOCIL in Glamsterdam: Lighthouse/Lodestar/Teku support; Grandine oppose; Nimbus/Prysm conditional
Testing/pandaops warn FOCIL adds 3-6 months delay; ePBS+FOCIL share fork-choice/networking complexity
Vitalik: need to be willing to make multi-fork commitments and signal CR and decentralization priorities

action_items.action: Develop credible FOCIL commitment for H-fork; discuss next ACDC
Split churn-sharing from EIP-8061 as alternative to 8071
